title: Digital Animation, 2008
description: Digital animation featuring the text "Échirolles Mois du Graphisme 21 Novembre 2008 - 31 Janvier 2009" emerging and receding in gray, pink, purple and white to the music of Maurice Ravel.
justification: Designed to promote a graphic arts festival held annually in Échirolles, a small town in France, Apeloig’s longstanding interest in dance is particularly apparent in this animation from 2008.&nbsp; As the text emerges, first as flat gray letterforms, then as multi-layered pink, purple, black and white, the individual letters grow and recede in tandem with the music of Maurice Ravel.&nbsp; With each musical note the animation varies, emphasizing the near abstract forms of each letter against the legibility of their whole.&nbsp;

tombstone.epitaph: Digital Animation, 2008. Digital animation. Gift of Philippe Apeloig. 2013-16-7.
